Name: Battletoads
Title: Arctic Caverns
Hint: These Swamp-Loving animals sure love getting into fights! …And often really epic ones.

Name: Lucky Luke
Title: Town
Hint: The Wild West has never been so lucky to have this guy around!

Name: Bully

Name: Minecraft

Hint: This is from the game where you build, fight, and loot.

Name: Halo
Title: Theme
Hint: You're serious?! You don't see the thing on your head??!

Name: Final Fantasy 7

Name: Viewtiful Joe

Name: Inscryption

Name: Plants vs Zombies

Name: RuneScape

Hint: The true grinding simulator game.

Name: Journey
Title: Threshold
Hint: You travel with other companions to climb up this mountain, through the desert, snow and other terrain.

Name: Far Cry 5

Hint: The church wants to rise up, take control and prevent a disaster that may or not really exist.

Name: L.S.L. III: Passionate Patti in Pursuit of the Pulsating Pectorals
Title: The Casino Song
Hint: This guy’s stuck in the 70s, picking up chicks in unconventional ways, but he’s still the envy of most virgins.

Name: Half Life 2
Title: Hazardous Environments
Hint: If something's on your head in this game: It's not Halo, you're dead.

Name: Myst
Title: Theme
Hint: If you've travelled to this island, found many pages but not confronted their thoroughly evil owners: You've really missed the point!

Name: Fallout 3
Title: Butcher Pete

Name: American McGee Alice
Title: Skool Daze
Hint: This game could really shrink you down to size!

Name: Satisfactory
Title: Main Menu
Hint: Building conveyor belts, splitters and devoting days to making systems work properly is the status quo with this game.

Name: Contra

Hint: This jacked-up guy sure likes infiltrating military establishments.

Name: Castle Crashers
Title: Dark Skies
Hint: Can you and your friends take on the castle to save the princesses and get the gem?!

Name: My Time at Portia

Name: Pokemon Stadium

Hint: Take to an arena and battle it out, to become the best around.

Name: Oblivion

Title: Moo Moo Farm, Yoshi Valley
Hint: Enough turtle shell attacks will drive anybody insane!

Title: Splat Attack!

Name: CTR: Crash Team Racing

Name: Jet Set Radio Future

Name: Daytona

Name: Lollipop Chainsaw

Name: Star Fox 64
Title: Meteo

Name: DuckTales
